title: Herbal Eye Compress (Warm/Cold)
excerpt: Reusable eye compress filled with organic rice and calming herbs (chamomile, fennel) for warm or cold ocular relief.
content:
## What Is This Eye Compress?
A cloth compress filled with organic rice and dried calming herbs (chamomile and fennel). Designed to be warmed in a microwave or chilled in a freezer for targeted eye relief.

## Ayurvedic Significance
Warm compresses calm Vata and improve circulation; cool compresses reduce Pitta-related inflammation and soothe puffiness. Herbs add gentle aromatherapeutic support.

### Key Benefits
- Relieves eye strain, sinus pressure, and puffiness.
- Reusable and easy to heat or chill.
- Portable for travel or office use.

## Ingredients
- Organic rice
- Dried chamomile
- Dried fennel
- Soft cloth pouch with removable filler

## Usage Instructions
- Warm: Microwave for short intervals (10–20 seconds) until comfortable; test temperature before applying.
- Cold: Chill in freezer for 20–30 minutes and apply as needed.

## Packaging
- Cloth pouch with instruction tag and storage bag.

## Safety & Consultation
- Avoid use on broken skin or open wounds. Those with severe eye conditions should consult an ophthalmologist.

## Why Choose This Compress?
Simple, herbal, and reusable relief for modern screen fatigue and sinus discomfort.
